definition: to provide work to relieve poverty
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Article 3 The welfare-to-work input is classified into in-kind input and capital input.
sentences.chinese: 第三條以工代賑投入分爲實物投入和資金投入。

sentences.english: At the present time, welfare-to-work is a policy for rural poverty alleviation.
sentences.chinese: 現階段，以工代賑是一項農村扶貧政策。
